title: bossU2Y
author: bossU2Y
content: Engines of Fury (EoF) is a 3D arena brawler metaverse with engaging PVE & PVP gameplay modes and stunning attention to visual details. Action-packed play to earn arena battler based on blockchain metaverse. Powered by $FURY.EoF is developing a captivating, stunning, and impressive retro-futuristic world 3D auto battler where players can:Duel: Engage in exciting PVE and PVP duels and tournaments.Win & Earn: Win tokens, forge items (NFTs), and earn profits.Upgrade: Buy, customize, and upgrade champions.Host: Buy arena lands, host fights for other players, and earn passive income.For more information please visit the website: www.eof.gg

comments.body: Oh nice i like the characters. But is this PAY-TO-WIN? Like i need to spend money to boost or strenghten my character to win? I just ask because i'm just a small investor but i like this kind of game.

comments.author: bossU2Y
comments.body: Okay, here's the thing! Players need to buy their first champion, and they are good to go. The price of a starting champion will be tied to a stablecoin to ensure a low entry point for new players to the game.Additional info!

comments.author: nahizelav
comments.body: Just want to know, what are the game modes or how can we play this kind of game? Because it looks interesting and cool since this is a 3D graphics game.

comments.author: bossU2Y
comments.body: Quote from: nahizelav on May 29, 2022, 02:35:28 PMJust want to know, what are the game modes or how can we play this kind of game? Because it looks interesting and cool since this is a 3D graphics game.Here are the specific gameplay mechanics and modes guidelines;PVE (against AI)Training ground - Play for free against AI, get to know your champion, its skills, item variations, andlearn how to bet your foes in real duels!Boss FIGHT - pay a small entry fee to fight against a Boss & earn experience points to level yourchampion. If victorious - receive tokens & a chance for an item, NFT, or NFT blueprint drops.PVP mode (against other players)Duel - Select an amount to stake, get matched with a similar MMR & level player, choose spells anditems to use, and go fight in the arena: players gain experience & the winner gets his foes stake.Tournament - Select an amount to stake, get matched with a dozen of players, and fight till the lastone standing. All players gain experience + first 3 places share the total stake + a chance for bonustokens, NFTs & NFT Blueprints.
